markdownRemark.html:
At Lambda School, we love postgres. Here are a few gems I've learned that make developing with it a joy:

PSQL for Mac

The best way to handle this is to install Postgres.app and then add the following to your shell profile:

export PATH=$PATH:/Applications/Postgres.app/Contents/Versions/latest/bin

Et voil√†! Reload your terminal and psql will be ready to go, along with other Postgres command line tools. To update to the latest version is as simple as opening Postgres.app and letting it update.

Running a Postgres database locally
